content:
Regard everything after ':' as the slot initialization. Respect the included specifications for the slots in during the NLU process: | Slot name | Entity specification | Mapping description, range | Aimed Type to map slot value into |
|-----------|----------------------|----------------------------|-----------------------------------|
| customerInterestedInSalesConfidence | a confidence value that estimates how interested the customer is to continue the sales process | A evaluation based on the customers statements, range [0...1] | float |
